name: Inacio's Dodgy Dungeon
description:
Controls (important!)Mouse & Keyboard

WASD - guess

Left Mouse Button - Attack

Space - Jump

Shift - Dodge

Tab - Toggle target lockon

Controller (X360 and compatible)

Face buttons and left shoulderbutton, plus analog sticks :^)

Graphics settings (if you're lagging)

Numpad 0 - Lowest

Numpad 1 - Medium

Numpad 2 - Highest
